name: Terrors in the Hidden City
effectText: Your opponent cannot target face-down Defense Position monsters you control with card effects. Monsters you control that were flipped face-up while this card was face-up on the field gain 1500 ATK/DEF. If this card in its owner's Spell & Trap Zone is destroyed by an opponent's card effect: You can target 1 monster in your GY; Special Summon it in face-down Defense Position.
